article.title: Budget 2014: The Dope On Who Gets How Much

content.value:
The Ministry of Finance gets the maximum allocation of Rs 6,36,923.09 crore in the interim Budget 2014-15 presented by Finance Minister P  Chidambaram today. The finance ministry had the maximum allocation last year.

 

The Ministry of Defence got the second highest allocation (Rs 2,79,202.87 crore) followed by the Ministry of Consumer Affairs, Food and Public Distribution.
